page.title: 14LOOKING AFTER PETS
page.content: We have got 6 gerbils,2 adults and 4 babies.The babies were born 3 weeks ago.When they were first born we gave the adults milk to drink.We didn't disturb them and we didn't clean the cage out.It takes 3 weeks for baby gerbils to open their eyes.We don't take the babies out because it might scare them.We feed the gerbils on gerbil food,gerbil treats,lettuce, peanuts,carrots and shredded wheat. We clean the gerbils about every 6 weeks.Sometimes we let one of the gerbils run on the snooker table,but we have to be careful because there are not any pockets on the holes.The adults have got names but the babies haven't.The light one is male and is called "Cream".The dark one is called "Coffee".There are 4 babies one light one and 3 dark ones.The male and the baby light one have albino eyes.
